name: Ocean Oddities
description:
You play as an explorer, journeying around the ocean in search of all kinds of strange and interesting treasures. Sail around in your boat, explore procedurally generated islands, and find as many randomly generated treasures as you can!

  • Ambient sound effects are by Epic Sounds and FX via the Unity Asset Store:
    • https://www.assetstore.unity3d.com/en/#!/content/38394
  • Music is by Fabio Di Santo via the Unity Asset Store:
    • https://www.assetstore.unity3d.com/en/#!/content/49863
  • Character controller is by Grant Marrs via the Unity Asset Store:
    • https://www.assetstore.unity3d.com/en/#!/content/55598
  • Skybox is by A.C via the Unity Asset Store:
    • https://www.assetstore.unity3d.com/en/#!/content/71422

This game was made for ProcJam 2017.
